author: josh
msg: Follow up fix after r644473 (bug 44739) TestHSSFConditionalFormatting had a bug and wasn't yet included in the test suite hierarchy

author: mrglavas
msg: Fixing a bug in the processing of the JAXP 1.2 "http://java.sun.com/xml/jaxp/properties/schemaSource"
property. When the value specified is a java.io.File we need to make sure we set the system ID on the
XMLInputSource otherwise relative URIs in the schema may not resolve.
Note that the FilePathToURI code was borrowed from XML Commons.
